entry.title: Operation Language Stories | I need your help!

media:group.media:title: Operation Language Stories | I need your help!
media:group.media:description:
***What I need from you*** Leave me a comment below with a very short story (100-300 words) using simple language appropriate for a beginner language student. I personally am going to pay for some of these stories to be translated into Thai. If you feel inclined to translate (or pay for translations) some of these stories into the language you are learning, please send me the translations, and I will post them all for anyone to use for free!
* If you post a story below, you are giving your consent for the story to be shared in the Operation Language Stories library, and anywhere that our stories are shared, published, posted and distributed.
Links: Operation Language Stories website: https://sites.google.com/view/fingtamlessons/open-source-lessons Hire translators on Fiverr: https://www.fiverr.com/search/gigs?query=thai%20translator&source=main_banner&search_in=everywhere&search-autocomplete-original-term=thai%20translator
______________________________________________________________

media:group.media:title: Stop making language goals
media:group.media:description:
Over the past four months I have stopped learning Thai and started putting a lot of time an energy into Esperanto. Why? Because I want to, and I donâ€™t care what anyone thinks.
Language learning is not core to my identity anymore. I will likely learn other languages in the future, but if I never do, thatâ€™s fine by me as long as Iâ€™m being true to myself and keeping my eyes set on whatâ€™s important. Language learning may or may not be part of that.
